text: The women's 49 kg competition of the weightlifting events at the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru, was held on July 27 at the Coliseo Mariscal Caceres. ==Results== 11 athletes from ten countries took part. {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !rowspan=2|Rank !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Nation !rowspan=2|Group !colspan=4|Snatch (kg) !colspan=4|Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2|Total |- !1 !2 !3 !Result !1 !2 !3 !Result |- | || align=left|Beatriz Pirón || align=left| || A || 82 || 85 || 87 || 87 AM || 100 || 104 || 106 || 106 || 193 AM |- | || align=left|Ana Iris Segura || align=left| || A || ~~80~~ || 80 || 83 || 83 || 100|| 105 || ~~111~~ || 105 || 188 |- | || align=left|Santa Cotes || align=left| || A || ~~74~~ || 74 || 80 || 80 || 91|| 95 || 97 || 97 || 177 |- | 4 || align=left|Nathasha Figueiredo || align=left| || A || 75 ||78 || 80 || 80 || ~~90~~ || 96 || ~~98~~ || 96 || 176 |- | 5 || align=left|Ludia Montero || align=left| || A || 76 || 80 || 82 || 82 || 93 || ~~96~~ || ~~97~~ || 93 || 175 |- | 6 || align=left|Margoth Reynoso || align=left| || A || 70 || 73 || 75 || 75 || 88 || ~~92~~ || ~~92~~ || 88 || 163 |- | 7 || align=left|Katherine Landeros || align=left| || A || 65 || ~~68~~ || 68 || 68 || 85|| ~~90~~ || 90 || 90 || 158 |- | 8 || align=left|Erika Ortega || align=left| || A || 64 || 67 || 70 || 70 || 83 || ~~86~~ || ~~86~~ || 83 || 153 |- | 9 || align=left|María Navarro || align=left| || A || 60 || ~~64~~ || ~~64~~ || 60 || 76|| 80 || 83 || 83 || 143 |- | rowspan=2| || align=left|Angélica Campoverde || align=left| || A || ~~73~~ || 73 || 76 || 76 || ~~94~~ || ~~94~~ || ~~94~~ || – || – |- | align=left|Fiorella Cueva || align=left| || A || 70 || 73 || 75 || 75 || ~~95~~ || ~~95~~ || ~~95~~ || – || – |} ==References== ==External links== *Results Women 49
title: Weightlifting at the 2019 Pan American Games – Women's 49 kg
